sleep.title: Winter Night Pro
sleep.subtitle: Premium – extended wind-down with binaural sleep waves
steps: Lower the lighting and settle into bed.
Let your eyelids grow heavy.
Breathe in slowly, exhale with ease.
Release tension from head to toes.
Allow each breath to carry you deeper into rest.
narration: Welcome to Winter Night Pro.
This premium session guides you into deep, restorative sleep.
Settle into your bed and make any final adjustments.
Allow the body to grow heavy and supported.
Breathe in slowly through the nose.
Exhale gently, releasing the day.
With each breath, the nervous system shifts toward rest.
Let the scalp and forehead soften.
Relax the jaw and allow the tongue to rest.
Release the shoulders away from the ears.
Feel the chest and belly rise and fall.
Soften through the torso, hips, and legs.
Let the feet feel heavy and warm.
The body is safe. The mind can rest.
Drift with the slow rhythm of the breath.
Sleep arrives when it is ready.
Welcome it effortlessly.
narrationLoop: Let the body feel heavy and supported.
Allow the breath to slow on its own.
With each exhale, soften a little more.
Rest in the calm of the room.
narrationLoopTwo: Release the face, then the shoulders.
Imagine the bed supporting your whole body.
Drift with the slow rhythm of the breath.

sleepStories.title: The Starlit Garden
sleepStories.subtitle: Premium – a gentle story to drift off
narration: Beyond the edge of the day, there is a garden that opens only at night.
You find the path by the light of the first star.
The ground is soft beneath your feet. The air is cool and still.
Flowers you cannot name bloom in silver and deep blue.
There is no hurry here. No door to knock on. No one waiting.
You walk slowly. You breathe slowly. The garden holds you.
Somewhere in the distance, water moves over stone.
The sky above is wide and quiet.
You find a bench, or perhaps a patch of moss, and you lie down.
The stars drift. Your thoughts drift. The night wraps around you.
You are safe. You are held. You can rest.
The garden stays with you as sleep draws near.
Let go. Let sleep come. The stars will keep watch.

sleepStories.title: The Railway to Rest
sleepStories.subtitle: Premium – a journey on the night train
narration: You board the night train with no destination in mind.
The car is nearly empty. The seats are soft. The windows are dark.
The engine hums a low, steady rhythm. The wheels click gently on the tracks.
You watch the lights of towns pass by, small and far away.
There is nothing to do but rest. Nothing to plan. Nothing to solve.
The motion rocks you. The darkness holds you.
Somewhere ahead, the train will stop. But not yet. Not for a long while.
You close your eyes and let the journey carry you.
The click of the rails becomes a lullaby.
You drift. The night rolls on. Sleep finds you somewhere between stations.

sleepStories.title: The Island of Soft Dreams
sleepStories.subtitle: Premium – a shore where you can rest
narration: You step onto the island as the last light leaves the sky.
The sand is warm under your feet. The waves are slow and even.
Palms whisper above you. The air smells of salt and flowers.
You walk to a hammock strung between two trees.
You lie back. The fabric sways. The waves keep their rhythm.
There is no phone here. No list. No hour to keep.
Only the sound of the sea. Only the drift of the breeze.
Your body grows heavy. Your mind grows quiet.
The island holds you. The night holds you.
Let the waves carry you into sleep.

breathwork.title: Box Breathing Advanced
breathwork.subtitle: Premium – 10 min guided with binaural beats

affirmations.title: I am a Billionaire
affirmations.subtitle: Premium – billionaire mindset and limitless wealth
steps: Find a quiet space and assume a posture of power and confidence.
Place your hands in a position that feels commanding and relaxed.
Breathe deeply and embody the mindset of a billionaire.
Repeat each affirmation with unwavering conviction.
Visualize yourself living and deciding as a billionaire does.
narration: Welcome to I am a Billionaire.
This premium session anchors you in the identity, decisions, and abundance of the billionaire mindset.
Find a space where you can sit or stand with confidence.
Breathe in slowly, and feel your power expanding.
Again, breathe in certainty, exhale any limiting belief.
I am a billionaire.
My thoughts, habits, and choices reflect billionaire abundance.
I operate from a place of limitless possibility.
I see opportunities where others see obstacles.
I invest in myself, my growth, and high-impact ventures.
I attract wealth, influence, and legacy-building relationships.
I think in terms of millions and billions, not limits.
I create value at scale and am rewarded accordingly.
I am unshakeable in my belief in my own success.
I manage money with the wisdom and discipline of the wealthy.
I give generously because I know abundance flows through me.
I am building a legacy that outlives me.
I wake each day with the energy and focus of a billionaire.
I am a billionaire in mind, in action, and in result.
The world responds to my vision and my commitment.
Take a deep breath and own this identity fully.
Carry this billionaire mindset with you into every decision.
narrationLoop: I think in terms of limitless possibility.
narrationLoopTwo: I operate from certainty, not doubt.
I invest in my growth and impact.
I am unshakeable in my success.
narrationLoopThree: I am building a lasting legacy.
I am a billionaire in mind and result.

affirmations.title: Optimum Health and Vitality
affirmations.subtitle: Premium – full vitality and wellbeing
steps: Find a comfortable position and close your eyes.
Take three slow breaths, filling the lungs fully.
Place your attention on your body.
Repeat each affirmation with care.
Feel vitality rising with each breath.
narration: Welcome to Optimum Health and Vitality.
This premium session strengthens your connection to your body's natural wellness.
Find a comfortable position and allow the eyes to close.
Breathe in slowly, filling the lungs.
Exhale fully, releasing tension.
Again, breathe in vitality, breathe out stagnation.
My body is a temple of health and energy.
Every cell in my body is healing and renewing.
I have boundless energy for the things that matter.
I choose foods and habits that support my vitality.
My immune system is strong and resilient.
I rest when I need to and wake up refreshed.
I move my body with joy and appreciation.
I listen to my body and respond with care.
My health improves every single day.
I am full of life force and radiant energy.
I honor my body and it rewards me with vitality.
I age with grace, strength, and vibrancy.
Wellness is my default state.
I am grateful for this strong, capable body.
Take a deep breath and feel the vitality within.
Carry this sense of health and energy with you.
narrationLoop: My body is healing and renewing.
narrationLoopTwo: I honor my body with care.
narrationLoopThree: I move with joy and appreciation.
I age with strength and grace.
My body rewards me with vitality.

affirmations.title: Become Successful in Your Chosen Career
affirmations.subtitle: Premium – career success and professional growth
steps: Sit upright in a confident posture.
Breathe steadily and center yourself.
Visualize yourself succeeding in your career.
Repeat each affirmation with conviction.
Feel the confidence of your future success.
narration: Welcome to Become Successful in Your Chosen Career.
This premium session supports your professional growth and career success.
Sit upright in a posture of confidence.
Breathe in purpose, exhale self-doubt.
Again, breathe in clarity, breathe out hesitation.
I am successful in my chosen career.
My skills and talents are recognized and valued.
I attract opportunities that advance my profession.
I am confident in my ability to achieve my goals.
I deserve success and I am creating it.
I learn quickly and adapt with ease.
My career path unfolds with clarity and purpose.
I communicate with confidence and respect.
I am a valuable asset in my field.
Challenges become stepping stones to greater success.
I network with purpose and build lasting professional relationships.
I am committed to excellence and it shows.
Success flows naturally when I align with my purpose.
I am exactly where I need to be, growing toward my goals.
I celebrate my progress and stay focused on the next level.
Take a deep breath and feel your professional power.
Carry this confidence and clarity with you into your work.
narrationLoop: I am successful in my career.
My skills are recognized and valued.
narrationLoopTwo: I learn and adapt with ease.
My career path has clarity and purpose.
Success flows when I align with purpose.
narrationLoopThree: I grow toward my goals every day.
